column4: hey, I installed apache2 and saw in the sites-enabled/000-default file that there is an alias pointing to /usr/share/doc..  however when I try localhost/doc, apache claims url 'doc' was not found on the server. Anyone know anything about that?
Do you have the /doc directory setup in apache2.conf?
A better answer would be /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/ is not the root directory of your website, you'll have to check apache2.conf to see what it is.
thanks, I'll try to move it there, was just wondering since it had the alias there installed by default after installing apache2
